name: OMNOMNOM Aquarium fun
description:
Four player team-based fish-munching game for the CRIME CITY ARCADE MACHINE. You control a single jaw and you must cooperate with your team-mate for munch the hooked fish.

Try to eat much fish as possible and avoid the fish-bomb.

Made during the NoMoweSweden 2013

Credits

Luca "Tato" Contato - Programming
Alessandro "Mr.a" Di Lecce - Graphics
Gunnar Weibull - Music
